data.name: Omega Labyrinth Life - Costume: Mio (Animal)
data.detailed_description:
Allows you to change the character on the home screen to 'Mio Animal Version'.

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.
data.about_the_game:
Allows you to change the character on the home screen to 'Mio Animal Version'.

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.
data.short_description: Allows you to change the character on the home screen to 'Mio Animal Version'.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280/Radeon HD 7750

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750　1GB

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Omega Labyrinth Life - Costume: Mio (Animal)

content_descriptors.notes:
Omega Labyrinth Life is a Rogue-like RPG where female characters brave dungeons.

This game contains partial nudity, sexual themes, harsh language, and content that may not be suitable for all ages. Although it does not contain any graphic sexual content, it does have a mode where characters can be touched and as such may not be appropriate for the workplace. 

*All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
